doc.field: MVTA Schedule Data - General Transit Feed Format
MVTA Schedule Data - General Transit Feed Format

These data include bus schedules for Minnesota Valley Transit Authority services in the south metro Twin Cities area. These data are published in the General (formerly Google) Transit Feed Specification format.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin>Minnesota Valley Transit Authority</origin><pubdate>Periodically revised</pubdate><title>MVTA Schedule Data - General Transit Feed Format</title><mgmg1cid /><pubinfo><publish>Minnesota Valley Transit Authority</publish></pubinfo><onlink>http://wiki.mvta.com/files/home/google_transit.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>These data include bus schedules for Minnesota Valley Transit Authority services in the south metro Twin Cities area. These data are published in the General (formerly Google) Transit Feed Specification format.</abstract><purpose>This data set was developed to distribute MVTA bus schedule data to the Google Transit application and others utilizing the same data structures.</purpose><supplinf>Twin Cities metro area, specifically a subset of Dakota, Scott, Hennepin, and Ramsey Counties</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20130725</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Includes schedule data from August 16, 2010 to December 3, 2010, including State Fair service and changes implemented on September 7 and September 11, 2010</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As Needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-93.352</westbc><eastbc>-93.079</eastbc><northbc>44.691</northbc><southbc>44.985</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><theme><themekey>transit, buses, transportation, schedules</themekey></theme><place><placekey>Minneapolis, St. Paul, Apple Valley, Burnsville, Eagan, Rosemount, Savage, Dakota County, Scott County</placekey></place></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>By acceptance of these data, the user agrees to include a copy of this metadata record, including disclaimers, whenever the user transmits or provides these data to another user.
